name: claude-code (anthropics)
description: [项目级] Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.。来源: https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.

来源: https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code
语言: Shell
Stars: 67970

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content: When you use Claude Code, we collect feedback, which includes usage data (such as code acceptance or rejections), associated conversation data, and user feedback submitted via the `/bug` command.

genes.title: plugins 模块说明
genes.content: This repository includes several Claude Code plugins that extend functionality with custom commands and agents. See the [plugins directory](./plugins/README.md) for detailed documentation on available plugins.
